title: Neurosurgery & Spine Care in India
intro: India is globally trusted for neurosurgery, offering advanced brain and spine procedures performed by internationally trained neurosurgeons using state-of-the-art technology.

brainTumor.title: Brain Tumor Surgery
brainTumor.description: Brain tumor surgery in India uses advanced navigation, microscopes, and minimally invasive approaches to safely remove tumors while preserving neurological function.

spine.title: Spine & Spinal Cord Surgery
spine.description: Indian hospitals treat spinal cord compression, disc prolapse, and deformities with minimally invasive spine surgery, reducing pain and improving mobility.

stroke.title: Stroke & Neuro-intervention
stroke.description: Stroke treatment in India includes rapid thrombolysis and neuro-interventional procedures, significantly improving survival and recovery outcomes.

dbs.title: Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS)
dbs.description: DBS surgery in India effectively treats Parkinson's disease and movement disorders using precise electrode placement and expert neurological care.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Neurosurgery
pediatric.description: India offers specialized pediatric neurosurgery for congenital brain and spinal disorders with excellent safety standards and long-term outcomes.

q1.question: Why is India trusted for neurosurgery and spine surgery?
q1.answer: India has highly experienced neurosurgeons, advanced brain and spine technology, minimally invasive techniques, and affordable treatment options for complex neurological conditions.

q2.question: What neurosurgical treatments are available in India?
q2.answer: Treatments include brain tumor surgery, spine and spinal cord surgery, stroke intervention, deep brain stimulation (DBS), and pediatric neurosurgery.

q3.question: Is minimally invasive brain and spine surgery available in India?
q3.answer: Yes. Many Indian hospitals offer minimally invasive neurosurgery, leading to less pain, shorter hospital stays, and faster recovery.

q4.question: Can medical reports and scans be reviewed before traveling to India?
q4.answer: Yes. Panacea Medcare arranges pre-travel case reviews and imaging evaluations with leading neurosurgeons to plan treatment in advance.

q5.question: How does Panacea Medcare support neurosurgery patients?
q5.answer: Panacea Medcare assists with doctor selection, treatment planning, visa support, hospital coordination, and rehabilitation arrangements.
